column2: I felt a peculiar shrinking from those pallid bodies.
column3: I felt a peculiar shrinking from those pallid bodies.

column2: And they were filthily cold to the touch.
column3: And they were filthily cold to the touch.

column2: 'The next night I did not sleep well.
column3: 'The next night I did not sleep well.

column2: I was oppressed with perplexity and doubt.
column3: I was oppressed with perplexity and doubt.

column2: Once or twice I had a feeling of intense fear for which I could perceive no definite reason.
column3: Once or twice I had a feeling of intense fear for which I could perceive no definite reason.

column2: Yet I could not face the mystery.
column3: Yet I could not face the mystery.

column2: I don't know if you will understand my feeling, but I never felt quite safe at my back.
column3: I don't know if you will understand my feeling, but I never felt quite safe at my back.

column2: At first she watched me in amazement.
column3: At first she watched me in amazement.

column2: 'I was in an agony of discomfort.
column3: 'I was in an agony of discomfort.

column2: The Morlocks at any rate were carnivorous!
column3: The Morlocks at any rate were carnivorous!

column2: If only I had thought of a Kodak!
column3: If only I had thought of a Kodak!

column2: With the last twenty or thirty feet of it a deadly nausea came upon me.
column3: With the last twenty or thirty feet of it a deadly nausea came upon me.
